name: FoxPro Project
summary: Learn about .PJX files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: Developers using Visual FoxPro save projects as PJX files to organize and manage application development within the software. The project structure allows users to integrate multiple database and user interface elements into a cohesive application.
NOTE: Microsoft discontinued Visual FoxPro, releasing the last version (9.0) in 2007. Therefore, PJX files are now obscure.

instructions: You can open PJX files with the discontinued Microsoft Visual FoxPro in Windows. To open a PJX file, select File â†’ Open.
